notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: D.K. performed cell culture, cytotoxicity assays, quantitative real time PCR, mRNA quantification assays, statistical analysis, and Western blotting. N.P. and D.C. carried out cell culture, cytotoxicity assays, RNA preparation, and Western blotting. K.K. and H.B. performed bioinformatics analysis. S.K.C. advised in the interpretation of the data. I.B. conceptualized and administrated the project, acquired funding, and provided with the materials. H.B.. conceptualized and designed the experiments, prepared for the RNA samples, analyzed the data, and wrote the manuscript.
